model-release.title: Model Release
model-release.description: Get permission to use someone's likeness in photos, videos, or advertising. Protects against privacy lawsuits.

photo-release-form.title: Photo Release Form
photo-release-form.description: Simple permission form to use someone's photo commercially. Required for marketing, websites, and publications.

photography-release.title: Photography Release
photography-release.description: Comprehensive release for professional photography projects. Covers usage rights, compensation, and image ownership.
